title: Restoring force and equilibrium - 3 carts - tunnel

content.description: In Scenario <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, a system of three connected carts can move along a track that has a flat, horizontal middle section between two sloping sections. In Scenario <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, a metal sphere moves vertically inside a tunnel through a planet of uniform density and with no atmosphere. The tunnel passes through the center of the planet and the sphere remains inside the tunnel. Which of the following correctly indicates which scenario(s), if either, has (have) an equilibrium position and a linear restoring force?
